revised_title: Chemical Constitution of Narcotine and Its Products of Decomposition
tldr: The authors investigate the chemical reactions and properties of narcotine and its products of decomposition, including opianic acid, meconin, and hemipinic acid. They discover new acids, such as methyl nor-opianic acid, methyl nor-meconic acid, and methyl-hypogallic acid, and describe the formation of a new base, methyl-nor-narcotine.
